title: Investigation and Elections
content:
Investigation and Elections

State Regulations
§ 251.8 - Investigation; ascertainment of desires of employees; notice
§ 251.9 - Elections; terms and conditions
§ 251.10 - Determination of representatives on consent
§ 251.11 - Decision by hearing officer

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
